title: Dual! Parallel Trouble Adventures
alternative_title: デュアル！ぱられルンルン物語
description: Kazuki is plagued by visions of giant robots that no one else can see. Before Kazuki knows what is happening, he gets ensnared by a pretty face, and then a mad scientist's experiment tosses him into a strange parallel world, where his imagined dangers have become very real!
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Harem>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>]
